mapper.select: SELECT c.ct, o.order_code, o.`status`, o.pay_amount, ps.spec_image_url , ps.id as productSpecId FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_product op ON op.order_id = o.id and o.user_id=#{userId} LEFT JOIN t_product_spec ps ON op.product_spec_id = ps.id LEFT JOIN t_product p ON ps.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( b.order_id ) ct, b.order_id FROM t_order a, t_order_product b WHERE a.id = b.order_id GROUP BY b.order_id ) c ON c.order_id = o.id

SELECT o.order_code, o.`status`, o.order_amount, o.pay_time,o.pay_type,o.pay_amount o.recipient_name,o.recipient_phone ,o.recipient_address ps.spec_image_url , ps.id as productSpecId,p.summary,p.name,op.price,op.quantity FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_product op ON op.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_product_spec ps ON op.product_spec_id = ps.id LEFT JOIN t_product p ON ps.product_id = p.id and o.id=#{orderId}
